name: The Lightning Scavenger
description:
Hello human, you are chosen by the great Zeus to return the most precious to me of all - my lightning bolt, my lightning has fallen into the underworld and broke to pieces, now you have the duty to return it.

Take Artemis' bow with you, you'll need it.

Every moment that passes when I am without my lightning bolt, the risk of the return of the Titans increases, they will destroy the world as we know it, Hades will send his faithful souls to stop you, you will have to eliminate them.

Now run scavenger, run!

This game is an Action - Adventures - Platformer game where you play as Lightning Scavenger, your job is to bring back Zeus's Lightning bolt that fell into the underworld.

CONTROLS:

A, W, D   to move.

SPACE   for dash.

Left click to shoot arrows.

Right click for melee attack.

MAKE SURE YOUR  COMPUTER IS AT 1080 x 1920  RESOLUTION BEFORE PLAYING THE GAME!
